text: This place has a very friendly crew behind it, good service and if something isn't correct then just be polite about it and they will gladly fix the issue. We order online and pick up at this location weekly. I invite you to see the recently remodeled location here at 9mile and Hoover Rd.

text: The pizza is always fresh and delicious and price  is great. Today I was in and they made a mistake with my order. They quickly realized it and remade one of my pizzas. They gave me the extra  "mistake" for my wait. I would have been happy with just the corrected order.
